reviews.title: So awesome for my toddler!
reviews.comment: My 2yo loves this app! I can\'t believe it: so simple, yet so much hoours of entertaining, simply I love how he enjoy playing on it
reviews.author: Rode Sarmiento

reviews.title: Adds... really???
reviews.comment: It\'s for a baby and there are adds... Lame... Uninstall... Other than that great app for my daughter...
reviews.author: A Google User
